mapper.insert: insert into vote(name, middlepart, start, end) values(#{name}, #{middlepart}, #{start}, #{end});
mapper.select: select v.* from vote v, middlepart mp, area a, voter vr where 1 and v.middlepart=mp.code and mp.areaCode=a.areacode and a.areacode=vr.areacode and vr.code = #{votercode} and not exists (select 'X' from votetf vtf where v.code = vtf.votecode and vr.code = vtf.votercode) union select * from vote where middlepart='대선';
